svg.text: ┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ OVERALL EVALUATION CRITERION (OEC) │ ├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤ │ │ │ Purpose: Combine multiple metrics into single decision │ │ │ │ Benefits: │ │ • Avoids cherry-picking favorable metrics │ │ • Reduces multiple testing problem │ │ • Aligns team on what andquot;successandquot; means │ │ • Enables faster decisions │ │ │ │ Challenges: │ │ • Requires agreeing on weights │ │ • Can be hard to interpret │ │ • May hide important nuances │ │ │ └─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
